utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So honey this uh, this threesome thing umm, I mean how-how are you gonna start to find…

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Ooh, actually I’ve been making a list of all the women I know who might be into doing this!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. Wow! Huh. Boy! Well, someone’s been doing their homework.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Yeah. Ooh, and I know Gail Rosten is in there twice, but she is so…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I know. Y’know, just-just talking about it is getting me kinda…

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Oh, me too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? Well, I-I think Ben’s asleep.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Oh umm, y’know I think it would be better if we just save it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Right. Save it. I can do that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, how’s it going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I’ve got to get out of this bed, I’m going crazy here. Crazy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here you go sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What the hell is this, herbal tea? I hate herbal tea!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But, I put some honey in it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She doesn’t know she was fired yet, does she?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, the doctors say it may kill her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you two girls whispering about over there?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But I think we should tell her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, maybe this whole heart attack thing is a sign, that-that you should start think about getting a different job.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, what is this? A stupid contest? Because we got a winner here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Listen Phoebe, he’s right. People are not supposed to have heart attacks at 31.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know! But if I didn’t work there, what else would I do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, you used to like playing the guitar.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah that was lucrative! Smart like your brother!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, what about y’know the massage thing? That never gave you a heart attack.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hmm, pulling in a salary in the high six figures or rubbing gross naked people for chump change—ooh, what do I do?! What will I do?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, I mean it’s just so realistic!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know. Yeah, his name is Pat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pat the dog. Oh! Oh! I get it!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Do you uh, do you—ready for a refill?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I probably shouldn’t—so I will! Oh! Wow! It’s like it’s raining!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pretty cool, huh? But if you’re thinking you can put a fish in there and it wouldn’t get sucked up into the mechanism, well you’d be wrong.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, can I use your bathroom?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s uh, right through there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. God y’know, if someone told me a week ago that I would be peeing in Joey Tribbiani’s apartment…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, life’s pretty great isn’t it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, it sure is!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I hope you’re hungry, we’re starting with oysters. And y’know what they say about oysters, don’t you?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Roger
utterance.content: They have parasites?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Umm well, some people say that Oysters are an aphrodisiac.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Roger
utterance.content: What people?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: People! People say it! Come here!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Roger
utterance.content: So oysters, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And then we’re gonna have a little Middle Eastern cous-cous. Something we can eat, with our hands.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Roger
utterance.content: Y’know, it’s funny, but when we were studying communicable diseases…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No-no-no, no! It’s sensual!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Roger
utterance.content: Ohh! Didn’t know! Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! Ohhh no!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Roger
utterance.content: I’m sorry sweetie, it’s the hospital. The food looks great, maybe save me some?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t promise anything.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We’re really gonna do this, huh?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Looks like it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know, if, if this is too weird for you, we can still back out at…

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: I got it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Susan! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Susan
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Thank you so much for coming.

utterance.speaker: Susan
utterance.content: Oh, I wouldn’t miss it for the world.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m-I’m Ross by the way.

utterance.speaker: Susan
utterance.content: Hello Ross. I love what you’ve done with this space.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Thank you so much.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How hot is this?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m sorry you’re here with me instead of Roger.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, me too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I could make it seem like he’s here. "Here’s some little known facts about cous-cous. They didn’t add the second cous until 1979."

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Stop it!! That’s not funny!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m sorry, okay? It just—tonight was supposed to be y’know, it was supposed to be a big deal.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What was tonight?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You don’t want to know what tonight was.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. What was tonight?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, tonight was—was going to be my first time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: With Roger? Not just with Roger?! Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right relax Mr. I’ve Had Sex Four Times!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Four different women! I’ve had sex way more times!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How many?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I was just waiting for the perfect guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well good, good for you. You really think that Roger is the perfect guy?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. He’s not a horrible guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey that’s what I tell girls about me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, I’m gonna die a virgin!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No you are not! You are sweet and wonderful and this is gonna happen for you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh really? When? Do you wanna do it with me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I was kidding.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So was I.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, you’re such an amazing actor! How do you know where Dr. Drake Remoray leaves off and Joey Tribbiani begins?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, with Dr. Drake they always tell me what to say. And with Joey, I pretty much have to make it up on my own.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! Tell me something Joey——Whoa! I just fell right off the couch there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah you did.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Here you go. Let me ask you a question.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: When was the last time someone told you just how beautiful you are?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! I can’t, I can’t feel my hands.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come, come here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We can’t do this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Oyster?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! If-if-if we did do this there would be a lot of pressure on me, y’know? Because you’ve been waiting a very long time and I wouldn’t want to disappoint you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah but see I have nothing to compare it too. So even if you’re horrible, how would I know?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I do like that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s harder for me! I have those four other women to compete with!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, if it helps there were only three. So it would just be for tonight, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Absolutely! It would just be one friend helping out another friend.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Stop it! We’re doing this! Let’s do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Noo!! Okay!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, do you have any uhh, moves?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I have some moves.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I have no moves. Okay, whatcha doin’ there?! Oh y’know what? I’m sorry, this is just too weird.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, let’s just forget it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What if I turn out the lights?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s the couch.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! I’ll tell you something, we are gonna do that again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Morning!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God. Oh I can’t believe Joey Tribbiani heard me throw up!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well he actually saw you a little bit too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo! Oh God we did—we didn’t, we didn’t uhh…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No! No, not after seeing that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God I’m just a horrible person.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wh-why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because I’m married. That’s right, I am a married woman! And I came to a TV star’s apartment to have an affair! Uck!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s ridiculous! I’m not a "Star," just a regular famous actor.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah and I’m a horrible, horrible person.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rachel, would you stop saying that?! Hey-hey look, remember on the show when-when Caprice was dying and she gave me…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The ring from the cave, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! Uh okay, well uh…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, they let you keep that stuff?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure! As long as they don’t find out you can keep whatever you want! And I want you to have it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! No-no-no…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes! Yes!! And every time you look at it, I want you to remember that you are a good person. Okay, you’ve had the chance to cheat, and with me, but you didn’t. And that’s what this ring stands for.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I thought that ring stood for Caprice’s undying love for her brother.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, do you want the ring or not?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look at you! You’re up!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I thought I’d try to take a walk. Would you pour me some water? I’ll be back soon.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa! You’re not gonna use the pay phone to call work, are ya?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No. I’ve learned my lesson.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Let’s go! Come on! Move it! Come on! Shoes! Briefcase! Thanks Lou, good luck with the gall bladder.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Joe did… Did you ever have a threesome?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well uh, look Ross I uh, I think Carol’s great and I’m sure you’re a very attractive man, but I….

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! The reason I’m asking is that… I sorta had one last night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! So, was it amazing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was, it was okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just okay—Did you do it right?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, it’s just did, did you ever go to a party and think, "Would really anyone miss me if I weren’t here?"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh. But still Ross, you’re worst day with two women, pretty much better than any other day! Y’know what I mean?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh, absolutely!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s just, my part seemed to be over pretty quickly and then, and then there was a lot of waiting around.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But you got to be with both of them, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not-not really. Th-th-there was just Carol.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not the other one?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, she kept kicking me away!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you don’t want that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well hey, at least you got to see a lot of stuff, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh I a lot of stuff!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got a little bored?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A little. Yeah. I made a snack.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah? What did ya have?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just a sandwich. Turkey, a little mustard…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sounds good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It really was!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me tell you about this chick I scored with last night! Oh no wait a minute that was you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, check me out, I’m a slut!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you uh, want to do something tonight?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh I can’t. Dr. Roger is coming over again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh. Oh right! Right! Because you’re still seeing him and uh, he’s a good guy. I mean, I remember a time when…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! Totally! Totally, and you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great! It’s so amazing! I mean, last time Dr. Roger came over, I was so nervous, but then after being with you I’m all like, "Can the doctor see me now?"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I bet he can.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know, I don’t have an appointment, but I sure could use a physical. Are you sure you’re okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah! Yeah! Don’t worry about me, I’ll be fine!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! My God! Barry!!

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: You-you-you said you were gonna be away all weekend!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that’s right! I’m sorry! I-I am early! Finish! Please!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Surprise! Look who’s back!

utterance.speaker: Arthur
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Arthur
utterance.content: Call security. Pheebs, didn’t you get fired?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, I don’t think so!

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Jack!! Hey!

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All better! Back to work! Except this clown from research told me I was fired. He should do his research, huh?

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: Well, you were fired.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nu-uh!

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: I told that guy who answered your phone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay I didn’t get that message. So this doesn’t count—Anyway, I’ll be in my office.

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: Uh, Phoebe you-you don’t have an office.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s all right, I’ll work here. This is goo, next to this plant.

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: Phoebe, listen…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re in my office! Look, I have made a lot of cash for this company! Okay? I am talking big bucks! Pesos! Yen! Rubles! You make one little mistake…

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: You lost 13 million dollars.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, so this is all about money! Y’know it’s bad enough that—Ow! Oh, you have got to be kidding!

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: Are you all right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m having another heart attack!

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m having another heart attack!! Call 9-1-1!!

utterance.speaker: Jack
utterance.content: Take it easy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Dumbass!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs! How’s it going?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, they fired me and I’m having heart attack.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Wow! Well, welcome back!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Is Joey Tribbiani here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, no.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, if you see him, will you please tell him that I’m looking for him and that this I am not gonna throw up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That-that’s always good news. Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Me? I’m great! I’m fine! I’m sooo good!! But, you know who’s not great?! Men! You’re a man right Ross?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sit down!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Let me uh, let me ask you something, do wedding vows mean squat to you people?! And why is it that the second we tell you we’re going out of town, bamn there you are in bed with the neighbor’s dog walker?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We’re sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No seriously! Seriously! What has happened to the sanctity of marriage?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Didn’t you spend last night at Joey’s?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aw what are you?! A detective?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look I-I don’t know what’s going on with you and your husband and what is hopefully an adult dog walker, look can I just say not all men are like that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! There are some men who will do whatever it takes to make their marriage work! Okay? There are some men who will stand by and-and watch as their wives engage in-in what only can be described as a twosome with some-some woman she barely knows from the gym!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who are these men?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Men. I guy I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, you might want to tell him it sounds like his wife is gay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She is not… She’s gay. Oh my God. She is so gay! I can’t believe this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good day for married people huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry your husband cheated on you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sorry your wife is gay. I guess women aren’t that great either.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Try telling my wife that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay to come in?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, come on, eat, whatever you want. Dr. Roger got beeped again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah I know, guess who beeped him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m the ruptured spleen.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why would you do that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because you shouldn’t be with him. You should be with me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! When you were talking about Roger, that was killing me! Look, things like last night they don’t just happen. Y’know? Or at least not to me. Or with the other two women, in the morning y’know I was just lying there and I couldn’t wait to just go hang out with my friends, but with you I always y’know with a friend.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know you probably don’t want to go out with me, y’know because I make too many jokes and I’ve never been in a serious relationship and I guess I’m not technically a "doctor…"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There was just one woman, wasn’t there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, there were two.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Including me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah.
